main event: A UFO was sighted in Ellenville, New York on April 8, 1966, appearing as a dim yellowish object that suddenly faded away.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for a total of 20 minutes.,The object appeared to be as long as a quarter of the mountain when it came closer.,The sighting involved multiple witnesses from the American Legion building.,Witnesses claimed to see an occupant inside the object.,The report concluded that the object might have been the moon at a certain angular size.
witness description: Some people witnessed the object from the American Legion building.
